title: 服务端奔溃，求救！！！
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Everything's going to plan. No, really, that was supposed to happen.

Time: 18-6-29 下午9:04
Description: Saving entity NBT

replies.author: a1294790523
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 a1294790523 于 2018-6-30 15:13 编辑 

保存Evilcraft的一个实体NBT时出现了问题[vengeanceSpirit (evilcraft.entities.monster.VengeanceSpirit)]
看起来是个怪物 你可以通过开启forge自动清除错误实体的功能来解决该问题
在config\forge.cfg找到
    # Set this to true to remove any Entity that throws an error in its update method instead of closing the server and reporting a crash log. BE WARNED THIS COULD SCREW UP EVERYTHING USE SPARINGLY WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR DAMAGES.
    B:removeErroringEntities=false复制代码
然后改成
    # Set this to true to remove any Entity that throws an error in its update method instead of closing the server and reporting a crash log. BE WARNED THIS COULD SCREW UP EVERYTHING USE SPARINGLY WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR DAMAGES.
    B:removeErroringEntities=[color=Red]true[/color]复制代码
即可

a26605483 发表于 2018-6-29 23:44
有一个错误的物品吧。。
大佬,能知道是哪个mod的问题吗??

replies.author: Mr.Seven590
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 q805705693 于 2018-6-30 04:49 编辑 

光从日志上来看，应该是EvilCraft-1.7.10-0.5.0b（邪恶工艺）出了问题，你删掉这个mod试试看，
而且似乎是这个mod的关于获取UUID的实体错误，


如果删掉该mod的config文件还是有问题的话，应该可以通过删地图，或者更新mod版本之类的方法来解决。
